title: Physics for the IB Diploma Study and Revision Guide (gnv64)
description: Physics for the IB Diploma Study and Revision Guide by John Allum Hodder Education | May 2017 | ISBN-10: 1471899721 | True PDF | 240 Pages | 13.7 mb Stretch your students to achieve their best grade with these year round course companions; providing clear and concise explanations of all syllabus requirements and topics, and practice questions to support and strengthen learning. - Consolidate revision and support learning with a range of exam practice questions and concise and accessible revision notes - Practise exam technique with tips and trusted guidance from examiners on how to tackle questions - Focus revision with key terms and definitions listed for each topic/sub topic CONTENTS Introduction v How to use this revision guide vi 1 Measurement and uncertainties 1 2 Mechanics 11 3 Thermal physics 34 4 Waves 46 5 Electricity and magnetism 74 6 Circular motion and gravitation 99 7 Atomic, nuclear and particle physics 108 8 Energy production 130 9 Wave phenomena 149 10 Fields 170 11 Electromagnetic induction 189 12 Quantum and nuclear physics 208 https://s26.postimg.org/iqhxe2lop/Physics_Study_and_Revision_Guide_for_the_IB_Dip.jpg
